description: An entity that represents an actual person, such as an employee of an organization.

firstName.description: The person's official first name in the system (such as HR database)

lastName.description: The person's official last name in the system (such as HR database)

middleName.description: The person's official middle name in the system (such as HR database)

email.description: The email addresses of the person; the first one in the array is the primary email.

emailDomain.description: The domain portion of the email addresses associated with the user account.

title.description: The person's role or title within an organization

phone.description: The person's phone numbers; the first one in the array is the primary contact number.

employeeId.description: The person's employee ID/number within an organization

userIds.description: One or more user Ids associated with this person

managerId.description: Employee ID of the person's manager

backgroundCheckedOn.description: Timestamp of the background and/or reference check

backgroundCheckedBy.description: The agency or person conducted the background/reference check
